headline.main: 'Real Offensive' Now On in Pacific, Knox Says; 'Bulk' of Navy Is There; 'REAL OFFENSIVE' IS ON IN PACIFIC

lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, July 2 -- The present fighting in the Southwest Pacific was characterized today by Secretary of the Navy Frank Knox as a "real offensive" by the United Nations and not merely an "island-to-island" advance on a long road to Tokyo.
snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, July 2 -- The present fighting in the Southwest Pacific was characterized today by Secretary of the Navy Frank Knox as a "real offensive" by the United Nations and not merely an "island-to-island" advance on a long road to Tokyo....

byline.original: By LAWRENCE E. DAVIESSpecial to NEW THE YORK TIMES
